Dialogue.content: Hi! I'm Aria Johnson. This is my first time talking here.
Hello, Aria! It's great to meet you. How can I assist you today?
I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my new semester in psychology.
I'm sorry to hear that. What's been frustrating you?
I'm working on a group project about mental health awareness, but one of my teammates, Sarah, seems really disengaged.
That sounds tough. Have you had a chance to talk to Sarah about how you feel?
Hi, I'm back. Things have gotten a bit more complicated.
Welcome back! What's been happening?
I tried to take more initiative in the project, but when I encouraged Sarah to share her thoughts, she dismissed me.
That must have been discouraging. How did that make you feel?
It made me anxious about leading the group. I'm worried I won't be able to connect with my teammates.
It's understandable to feel that way. Have you thought about how you might approach the group again?
Hello. I'm feeling really burnt out right now.
Hi Aria. I'm here to help. What's been causing you to feel burnt out?
With the deadline approaching, I've been working late nights to keep the project on track. During a rehearsal today, I stumbled on my presentation and felt embarrassed.
That sounds really overwhelming. It's tough when you put in so much effort and feel unsupported. Have you reached out to anyone in your group for help?
Not really. I don't want to add to their stress, and I feel ashamed for struggling.
I finally shared my feelings with my family, and it helped a bit.
It's good to hear that you reached out to your family. How did they respond?
They encouraged me to talk openly with my teammates about how I'm feeling. But I still feel conflicted about confronting them.
It's normal to feel conflicted. Remember, communication can lead to better understanding and help resolve your concerns. Have you thought about what you want to say?
I've thought about it, but I'm still unsure about how to approach it.
Take your time to organize your thoughts. You could write down what you want to say to help clarify your feelings. I believe you can do this.
